, from 1998 to 2001. Vint Cerf said Eric Schmidt had been chief executive for 10 years--`` a nice round number''-- and Larry Page was ready to lead the company into the future. Larry Page and Sergey are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said. Google has grown over the past decade from a start-up battling other Internet search engines into a technology giant with nearly 25,000 employees and annual revenue of nearly$ 30 billion.
